title: RemClock
lead: A small, intentional app built to help with focus, routines, and time awareness.
summary: RemClock started as a personal tool to make routines feel more intentional and less overwhelming. I’ve been designing and refining it around simplicity, gentle reminders, and features that actually help me stay present instead of distracted.
bullets: Designed around simple time blocks and reminders
Focus on clarity and minimal friction rather than feature overload
Iterative development driven by personal use and reflection
Built to support routines, not control them

title: Personal Website
lead: A personal space to document my projects, research interests, and ongoing work. Actually I think you might be on it.
summary: Designed and built a modular personal website to showcase projects and research while prioritizing clarity, maintainability and my own learning
bullets: Custom JSON-driven content system for projects, research, and media
Modular JavaScript rendering reused across the site
Designed to scale as projects and research grow (and as I inevitably change things)
Focused on clarity, accessibility, and not overengineering a personal site

title: Portable Pedal-Powered Generator
lead: A mechanically driven power generation system designed to convert human pedaling into usable electrical energy for everyday devices.
summary: Designed and manufactured a portable mechanical generator capable of producing usable DC power for phone charging and lighting.
bullets: Custom transmission and gearing
Back-driven stepper motor generation
Power electronics and user interface
Validated under real-world load conditions

title: Rear Suspension FEA & Design Optimization
lead: A comprehensive analytical and finite element study of a double wishbone rear suspension system under static loading.
summary: Performed a full mechanics-of-materials and finite element analysis of a rear suspension assembly to evaluate load paths, deformation behavior, and stress concentrations. Validated analytical statics against SolidWorks Simulation results, compared fixed and spring-supported shock configurations, and developed a simplified lower control arm model for efficient mesh convergence and design optimization studies.
bullets: Derived internal reaction forces using full statics and mechanics of materials
Multi-body FEA of complete suspension assembly in SolidWorks Simulation
Comparison of fixed vs spring-supported shock behavior and system deformation
Mesh convergence study validating stress accuracy in critical fillet regions
Simplified lower control arm model reproducing full-assembly stress within 0.1%
Design optimization achieving ~14% volume reduction while maintaining FOS > 3.5

report.title: Rear Suspension FEA & Optimization – Final Report

title: Quadcopter Altitude Feedback Control System
lead: A PID-controlled quadcopter altitude model designed to achieve stable, accurate height regulation under disturbances.
summary: Modeled and controlled the vertical motion of a quadcopter using classical feedback control techniques. Derived the plant dynamics from Newton’s laws, analyzed open-loop stability, and designed a PID controller to achieve zero steady-state error, minimal overshoot, and stable transient response. Controller performance was validated through MATLAB and Simulink simulations, including disturbance rejection and reference tracking.
bullets: Derived UAV altitude plant model as a mass–damper system with gravity and drag
Open-loop stability analysis revealing type-1 system behavior
PID controller design using root locus and Control System Designer
Simulink validation with step and sinusoidal reference tracking
Disturbance rejection analysis under gravity input
Achieved stable closed-loop response with zero steady-state error

title: Accessible Cup Holder Bracket
lead: An accessibility-focused mechanical component designed for real-world use, emphasizing manufacturability, strength, and cost efficiency.
summary: Designed, analyzed, and manufactured a sheet-metal steel cup holder bracket for wheelchair and crutch users.
bullets: Sheet-metal plasma cutting, bending, welding
FEA-based structural validation
Cost and time studies for scaling

report.title: Accessible Cup Holder Bracket – Final Report
